themes.description: Core concepts of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building web pages
learning_outcomes: Create semantic HTML5 structures for web content
Apply CSS styling and layouts to web pages
Implement basic JavaScript interactivity
Debug front-end code using browser developer tools

themes.description: Techniques for creating adaptive, accessible web experiences
learning_outcomes: Design responsive layouts that work across devices
Implement mobile-first design principles
Apply WCAG accessibility standards
Test websites for cross-browser compatibility

themes.description: Advanced JavaScript features and working with web APIs
learning_outcomes: Use ES6+ JavaScript features (arrow functions, destructuring, async/await)
Fetch data from REST APIs using fetch or axios
Handle asynchronous operations and promises
Parse and manipulate JSON data

themes.description: Building applications with React and component-based architecture
learning_outcomes: Create React components using JSX
Manage application state with hooks
Implement routing in single-page applications
Integrate third-party libraries and components

themes.description: Development workflow, bundling, and publishing web applications
learning_outcomes: Configure webpack or Vite for project bundling
Use npm or yarn for dependency management
Deploy applications to cloud platforms (Netlify, Vercel)
Implement continuous integration for automated builds

themes.description: Techniques for improving web application speed and efficiency
learning_outcomes: Analyze page load performance using Lighthouse
Optimize images and assets for web delivery
Implement code splitting and lazy loading
Apply caching strategies for better performance
